summary: Verified mobile category fixes - all 14 categories now match desktop, subcategory modal opens correctly on category click, 'Friendship & Dating' is visible in All dropdown
critical_code_review_comments: MobileHeader.tsx FULL_CATEGORIES list correctly matches HomeDesktopHeader.tsx with 14 categories
Category IDs use underscore format (auto_vehicles, friendship_dating) which enables proper subcategory lookup
Subcategory modal integration is working correctly via useSubcategoryModal hook
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile category fixes verified. All 14 categories present in MobileHeader matching desktop HomeDesktopHeader. Subcategory modal opens correctly when clicking any category on mobile. Friendship & Dating category visible in All dropdown modal.
tests_passed: Mobile homepage shows correct categories matching desktop (Auto & Vehicles, Properties, Electronics, etc.)
Clicking Auto & Vehicles category opens subcategory modal with all subcategories listed (Cars: 19, Motorcycles & Scooters: 10, etc.)
Friendship & Dating category is visible in the All dropdown modal
Category IDs use underscore format (auto_vehicles, friendship_dating) for proper subcategory lookup
Subcategory modal shows subcategory names and counts correctly
Properties category subcategory modal works (15 total listings)
Friendship & Dating subcategory modal works (20 total listings)
